definition: a metal cleat on the bottom front of a horseshoe to prevent slipping, to injure with a calk
details:
noun
- a metal cleat on the bottom front of a horseshoe to prevent slipping
= synonyms: calkin
verb
- to injure with a calk
- to seal with caulking
= example: to seal with caulking
= synonyms: caulk
- to provide with calks
= example: to provide with calks
